oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mrs. Ina Davies McFerrin, circa 1898 October 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A wedding photograph of Mrs. Ina Davies McFerrin, the first wife of Dr. Marvin McFerrin, a prominent Nashville, Tennessee dentist. According to the verso inscription, this photograph was "taken Oct. 1898, married, 4th." She was an aunt of Federal Judge Elmer Davies of the United States District Court for the Middle District of Tennessee. The photographer's studio logo is embossed on the front: W. G. & A. J. Thuss, 230 North Cherry Street, Nashville. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8.5 x 11 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: McFerrin, Ina D., d. 1912
